short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is made to make your experience on Heist more fun and help you be more PROFITABLE!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Heist Supervisor: Optimize Your Gaming in The Heist Game

  Enhance your experience in The Heist Game with Heist Supervisor, a Chrome extension crafted 
  to elevate your strategic play. Developed by a dedicated game enthusiast, it offers a range of 
  features to improve decision-making and in-game management.

Features at a Glance:

  Advanced analytics for better game strategy.
  Real-time financial tracking of KIWI, NANA, and SOLANA.
  Private chat functionality for seamless trade negotiations.
  Continuous updates for a constantly evolving gaming experience.

 Simplified yet Powerful:
  Heist Supervisor is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly, offering powerful tools without 
  overwhelming the player. It's the perfect companion for both new and veteran players of The 
  Heist Game.

Continuous Development:
  We are committed to regularly updating the extension, adding new features, and refining 
  existing ones. Your feedback is invaluable in this journey.

Learn More:
  For a detailed overview of Heist Supervisor and its features, please refer to our comprehensive 
  guide.
